product_name: REI Quarter Dome T3 Plus Footprint - Special Buy
long_description: The REI Quarter Dome T3 Plus footprint extends the life of your tent by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear and tear during all your camping adventures. Footprint is slightly smaller than the tent floor to prevent water from pooling underneath the tent during rainy weather. Webbing stake-outs at corners provide easy attachment. The REI Quarter Dome T3 Plus Tent is sold separately. Special buy.
short_description: The REI Quarter Dome T3 Plus footprint extends the life of your tent by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear and tear during all your camping adventures.
